Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Troy in 1975...
Traded from Troy to Boston (FBA) on 1/31/1975 (Going to TRO: P M. Roleke, C M. Richins, P W. Cerda. Going to SHP: 3B R. Hughes)...
Had first career hit (triple) on 7/21/1976, off Andres Echeverria (NE)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/21/1976, off Andres Echeverria (NE)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1976, hitting .348 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against New Jersey on 5/16/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1977, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1977...
Drove in 6 runs against New Jersey on 9/21/1978...
Hit 3 homeruns against Manchester, driving in 3 runs on 5/18/1979...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1979, hitting .481 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Bay City on 8/17/1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1979, hitting .571 with 4 HR, 15 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1979, hitting .396 with 10 HR, 31 RBI...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1979, hitting .302 with 41 HR, 120 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1980, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Northeastern on 4/15/1980...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1980, hitting .299 with 9 HR, 27 RBI...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1980...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1983, hitting .396 with 8 HR, 23 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1983, hitting .450 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/14/1984 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1984, hitting .480 with 4 HR, 5 RBI...
